[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    INT   00000000_00000000_00000000_00000011 is converted into SFP   01000000_10000000_00000000
    INT   00000000_00000100_00000000_00000000 is converted into SFP   01010001_00000000_00000000
    SFP   01000000_10000000_00000000 is converted into INT   00000000_00000000_00000000_00000011
    SFP   01010001_00000000_00000000 is converted into INT   00000000_00000100_00000000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
shiftnum = 17
ms2_Before : 01000000_10000000_00000000
ms1.raw.frac : 0
ms2.raw.frac : 32768
signif1 : 65536
signif2 : 98304
G, R, S : 0 65536 32768
ms2_AFTER : 01000000_00000000_00000001
SFP_AFTER : 01010001_00000000_00000000
    01000000_10000000_00000000 + 01010001_00000000_00000000 = 01010001_00000000_00000001

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    01000000_10000000_00000000 * 01010001_00000000_00000000 = 01010010_10000000_00000000
